message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses a problem in human resources and proposes a solution using combinatorial pure exploration (CPE) in the stochastic multi-armed bandit setting. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG), which often deal with bandit problems. Additionally, the paper mentions the concept of structured interviews, which falls under the sub-category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The use of simulations on real data suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-categories of information retrieval (cs.IR) and social and information networks (cs.SI).
